description:
* Based on a romance drama manga by http://anidb.net/cr79797 [Yuzuki Chihiro].
When high schooler http://anidb.net/ch145934 [Mari], bumps into a fellow tardy http://anidb.net/ch145935 [student], she`s surprised to find out he`s a beastfolk who`s to attend her school! After all, it`s not rare for beastfolk to coexist alongside humans, but it`s still uncommon, with the prejudice and all. Nervous to meet one at first, Mari soon learns there`s more to him than his furry exterior. In fact, the more she gets to know him, the more she finds herself drawn to him, his steadfastness, his kind-heartedness, and...body...
Source: Yen Press

titles.title: Kimi to Koete Koi ni Naru
キミと越えて恋になる
With You, Our Love Will Make It Through
